entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon except 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h except 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Wind becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Monday 3 April 2023
